features: Tri-capsule array - 3 condenser capsules can record almost any situation.
Multiple pattern selection - cardioid, bidirectional, omnidirectional & stereo.
Gain control, mute button, and zero-latency headphone output.
Perfect for vocals, musical instruments, podcasting, voiceovers, interviews, field recordings, conference calls. Signal to Noise: 100dB

Compatible with Windows 10, Windows 8 (including 8.1), Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows XP (Home and Professional), and Mac OS X (10.4.11 or higher), and requires a minimum of 64 MB of RAM(remove existing and upload).

productInformation.name: Special Feature
productInformation.value: The Yeti is the most advanced and versatile multi-pattern USB microphone available anywhere. Combining three capsules and four different pattern settings, the Yeti is the ultimate tool for creating amazing recordings, directly to your computer. THX Certified for exceptional sound and performance, the Yeti can capture anything with a clarity & ease unheard of in a USB microphone. The Yeti features Blue’s innovative triple capsule array, allowing for recording in stereo or your choice of three See more

productInformation.name: Included Components
productInformation.value: Yeti USB mic with desktop stand, USB cable

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Blue’s Legendary Broadcast-Quality Sound Makes the professional difference for recording, streaming and building your audience. Custom Three-Capsule Array Produces clear, powerful, broadcast-quality sound for YouTube, game streaming, podcasting, conference calls and music. Onboard Audio Controls Studio controls for headphone volume, pattern selection, instant mute, and microphone gain put you in charge of every level of the recording and streaming process. Unique Positionable Design Adjust and pivot the microphone in relation to the sound source to optimize your sound quality.

Blue VO!CE Broadcast Vocal Effects Craft the perfect broadcast vocal sound and entertain your audience with enhanced effects, advanced modulation and HD audio samples. Requires download and installation of LOGITECH G HUB. Four Pickup Patterns Cardioid, omni, bidirectional, and stereo pickup patterns offer incredible flexibility, allowing you to record in ways that would normally require multiple microphones. No-Latency Monitoring Monitor your voice in real time mixed with the sound from your computer to make sure your streams sound great. Plug 'n Play on Mac and PC Instantly start recording and streaming on Mac or PC.

Four Patterns for Ultimate Versatility Four distinct pickup patterns allow you to record and stream in ways that would normally require multiple microphones. Cardioid Mode Perfect for podcasting, game streaming, YouTube productions, Skype calls, vocals and instruments, cardioid mode captures sound sources that are directly in front of the microphone. Omni Mode Omnidirectional mode picks up sound all around the microphone. Great for conference calls and captures the feeling of "being there." Bidirectional Mode Bidirectional mode picks up sound from both the front and rear of the microphone, but not the sides. Ideal for two-person podcasts. Stereo Mode Stereo mode picks up sound from left to right in front of the microphone. Great for recording music or a 3-person podcast.

Compare Blue Microphones 3 Condensers Capsules 4 Condensers 4 Patterns 4 USB Output USB 3 Condensers Capsules 1 Large Condenser 4 Patterns 1 USB Output XLR 3 Condensers Capsules 1 Large Condenser 4 Patterns 1 USB Output XLR

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unleash your Sonic Potential with the Blue Yeti USB Mic
reviews.reviewText: With its unique blend of adaptability, sound quality, and user-friendly features, the Blue Yeti USB Mic has the potential to revolutionize the recording and streaming industries. For artists, podcasters, streamers, and musicians alike, this microphone has proven to be an invaluable tool due to its high quality design and sophisticated recording capabilities.The Blue Yeti USB Mic's striking silver exterior is immediately eye-catching right out of the box. Its adjustable stand offers stability and flexible positioning, and its design strikes a balance between modern and classic. Whether you're recording in a studio or at home, this microphone will make a huge difference.The Blue Yeti's dedication to high-quality sound is evidenced by the three condenser capsules it contains. These capsules collaborate to pick up subtle sonic details, resulting in recordings that are accurate to the original. The Blue Yeti has an incredible ear for detail, making it ideal for recording anything from vocals to instruments to podcasts and live broadcasts.The microphone's ability to switch between cardioid, bidirectional, omnidirectional, and stereo pickup patterns is a notable feature. Because of this adaptability, users can shape their recording sessions to fit their unique requirements. The Blue Yeti has a pickup pattern that works for any situation, whether you're recording a podcast episode by yourself, conducting an interview with several people, or capturing ambient soundscapes.The recording procedure is simplified by the inclusion of a headphone output and volume control. In order to get the best possible recording quality, you can use this function to listen to your audio in real time and make adjustments as needed. The mic gain control is also useful because it allows you to adjust the microphone's sensitivity to your liking, reducing the likelihood of distortion and noise in your recordings.If you're looking for a fuss-free recording experience, the Blue Yeti's plug-and-play flexibility is a blessing. You may start recording as soon as you plug the USB cable into your computer, choose a pickup pattern, turn up the headphones, and turn up the mic gain. Because of its ease of use, the Blue Yeti may be utilized by authors of varying degrees of technical proficiency.The Blue Yeti's versatility is bolstered by the fact that it works with standard audio recording and streaming programs. The microphone works well with popular recording and streaming applications like Audacity and OBS Studio, respectively, so you can concentrate on your material rather than the software.The Blue Yeti USB Mic excels not just in sound quality but also in durability, an area typically neglected by the audio industry. Its sturdy build guarantees it can survive the rigors of everyday use without sacrificing functionality. The microphone is sturdy and well-built, and the stand is easily adjusted.Finally, the Blue Yeti USB Mic proves that quality and innovation can coexist in the field of audio recording and streaming. Its high-quality audio, flexible pickup patterns, user-friendly controls, and long lifespan make it an indispensable tool for anyone producing audio content at a professional level. The Blue Yeti USB Mic will take your recordings, broadcasts, and interviews to the next level, whether you're a podcaster, gamer, interviewer, or musician. The plug-and-play simplicity and user-friendly interface make it a good option for novices while yet providing the advanced functionality that seasoned pros need. The Blue Yeti USB Mic has proven itself to be an invaluable tool in the field of audio recording and streaming, so it is no surprise that it has been given a perfect score of five stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unmatched Audio Clarity for All Creators
reviews.reviewText: The Logitech for Creators Blue Yeti USB Microphone is not just a recording device; it's a game-changer in the world of digital audio. Garnering a well-deserved 5-star rating, this microphone stands as a testament to Logitech's commitment to quality and innovation, particularly for content creators, podcasters, and musicians. It's a tool that bridges the gap between professional studio equipment and accessible home recording.One of the most striking features of the Blue Yeti is its exceptional audio clarity. The microphone captures sound with a crispness and depth that is rare in USB microphones. Whether you're recording a podcast, streaming live, or laying down vocal tracks, the Yeti delivers a rich, clean sound that elevates the quality of your content.Versatility is another key strength of this microphone. The Blue Yeti offers multiple pattern settings (cardioid, bidirectional, omnidirectional, and stereo), allowing users to tailor the mic's pickup to suit a wide range of recording scenarios. This flexibility is invaluable for creators who work on diverse projects and need a microphone that can adapt to different recording needs.The design of the Blue Yeti is both functional and aesthetically pleasing. The microphone has a solid, durable build that can withstand the rigors of regular use. Its sleek and modern look makes it a stylish addition to any recording setup, while its adjustable stand and easy-to-use controls provide convenience and ease of operation.The plug-and-play aspect of the Blue Yeti is a major advantage, especially for creators who want quality audio without the complexity of traditional audio equipment. The USB connectivity means you can easily connect it to your computer and start recording in minutes, making it accessible to both beginners and professionals.TL;DR: The Logitech for Creators Blue Yeti USB Microphone is a standout choice for anyone serious about audio quality. Its crystal-clear sound capture, versatility in recording patterns, durable and sleek design, and user-friendly setup make it an essential tool for creators across various fields. Whether for podcasting, streaming, music, or other digital media, the Blue Yeti is a reliable, high-quality microphone that meets the demands of creative professionals.

Blue yeti es una buena marca, muy sencilla de utilizar si planeas utilizarlo solo conectándolo a tu computadora, pero cabe resaltar que el sonido mejora muchísimo mas si haces uso de sus programas y de equipos externos de sonido. Lo único es que a mi micrófono pese a limpiarlo constantemente le salieron unas manchas al rededor del botón de mute y en la parte trasera. Pero no es algo que afecte al dispositivo ni que genere un cambio en la textura del metal, simplemente es algo visual que por el momento no he logrado quitar con nada, pero Fuera de lo estético es un producto que funciona 10 de 10.Lo único que debes en cuenta es que es un micrófono muy potente y eso hace que pueda captar incluso sonidos que parecen muy lejanos. Pero nada que configuraciones o filtros antipop y otras cosas no puedan solucionar.Llego con un buen embalaje, en el tiempo indicado, y en perfectas condiciones. Recomendado

Logo que chegou, a primeira frase que falei sozinho ainda com a caixa fechada: "Que caixa pesada!!"Abri a caixa e veio a segunda frase: "Ah, está explicado todo esse peso!!!".Para todos terem uma ideia do que estou falando, somente o microfone é maior e mais largo do que aquele copo de requeijão de vidro. Só o microfone tem 19,5 cm aproximadamente de altura por quase 7 cm de largura. Bem robusto. Típico microfone de mesa!!!Com o seu suporte (que pesa bastante) ele vai medir pouco mais de 29 cm de altura (coloquei uma foto com a régua para todos perceberem).Produto de qualidade superior. Microfone muito bem feito, acabamento fosco, ridiculamente fácil de usar. Coloca o fio que vem com ele na porta USB e coloca um fone de ouvido (com ou sem microfone, tanto faz) e pronto! Já está funcionando! É possível configurar a melhor captura para o seu uso entre Cardioide, Omnidirecional, Bidirecional e Estéreo (essa informação também está ali nas fotos).Estou muito satisfeito com essa compra. Quem usa para streaming estará muito bem amparado. Ainda é possível utilizá-lo em aplicativos de reunião como Zoom e Microsoft Teams (testei estes 2).Não é barato, então faça um breve questionamento para você mesmo dos seus interesses e resultados. Se você precisa de um áudio muito bom nos seus vídeos (gravados ou streamings ao vivo) e apresentações, não tenho a menor dúvida que este produto é para você!

Das Blue Yeti USB-Mikrofon ist ein beeindruckendes Allroundtalent für Aufnahmen, Streaming, Gaming und Podcasting auf PC und Mac. Mit seiner professionellen Klangqualität und seiner Vielseitigkeit bietet es eine erstklassige Audioerfahrung für alle, die nach höchster Präzision und Leistung streben.Das Blue Yeti USB-Mikrofon überzeugt bereits auf den ersten Blick durch sein robustes und ansprechendes Design. Die solide Verarbeitung und das ansprechende äußere Erscheinungsbild machen es zu einem Blickfang auf dem Schreibtisch. Es ist einfach zu bedienen und lässt sich problemlos mit dem Computer verbinden, ohne dass zusätzliche Treiber erforderlich sind.Die Klangqualität des Blue Yeti Mikrofons ist außergewöhnlich. Es bietet eine hervorragende Audioauflösung und erfasst Stimmen und Instrumente in kristallklarer Qualität. Mit den verschiedenen Aufnahmemodi, einschließlich Nieren-, Kugel-, Acht- und Stereo-Richtcharakteristik, können Sie den Klang an Ihre spezifischen Anforderungen anpassen. Dadurch eignet sich das Mikrofon sowohl für Solo-Aufnahmen als auch für Gruppengespräche oder Interviews.Das Blue Yeti USB-Mikrofon bietet zudem eine beeindruckende Flexibilität bei der Positionierung. Es verfügt über einen verstellbaren Mikrofonarm, der es Ihnen ermöglicht, das Mikrofon in der idealen Position zu platzieren und unerwünschte Geräusche oder Vibrationen zu minimieren. Darüber hinaus bietet das Mikrofon eine integrierte Kopfhörerüberwachung, sodass Sie Ihre Aufnahmen in Echtzeit hören und überwachen können.Die Kompatibilität mit verschiedenen Aufnahmeprogrammen und Betriebssystemen macht das Blue Yeti USB-Mikrofon äußerst vielseitig. Egal, ob Sie auf einem PC oder Mac arbeiten oder Ihre Aufnahmen direkt streamen möchten, das Mikrofon ist einfach einzurichten und kompatibel mit den gängigen Audio- und Streaming-Plattformen.Zusammenfassend lässt sich sagen, dass das Blue Yeti USB-Mikrofon eine hervorragende Wahl für professionelle Aufnahmen, Streaming, Gaming und Podcasting ist. Mit seiner erstklassigen Klangqualität, der flexiblen Positionierung und der einfachen Bedienung bietet es eine beeindruckende Leistung für alle, die nach hochwertigem Audio streben. Investieren Sie in dieses Mikrofon und erleben Sie den Unterschied, den es in Ihrer audiovisuellen Produktion und Kommunikation machen kann.

reviews.reviewTitle: Un micro de qualité professionnelle pour tous les usages
reviews.reviewText: J'utilise le micro Yeti depuis quelques années et j'en suis très satisfait. C'est un micro USB qui se branche facilement sur mon ordinateur et qui offre une qualité de son exceptionnelle. Il a quatre modes de captation différents (cardioïde, bidirectionnel, omnidirectionnel et stéréo) qui s'adaptent à différents usages. Par exemple, le mode cardioïde est idéal pour enregistrer une voix ou un instrument isolé, tandis que le mode omnidirectionnel permet de capter le son ambiant ou une conversation à plusieurs. Je l'utilise principalement en mode cardioïde pour le streaming ou le gaming et je n'ai aucun problème de bruit de fond ou de distorsion.Le micro est très solide et bien fini, avec un design élégant et sobre. Il est livré avec un support réglable et robuste, qui permet de le poser sur un bureau ou de le fixer sur un bras articulé. Il dispose également d'une prise casque pour écouter le son en direct, d'un bouton de contrôle du volume, d'un bouton de coupure du son et d'un sélecteur de directivité. Le seul inconvénient que je lui trouve est qu'il est assez volumineux et lourd, ce qui peut poser problème si on veut le transporter ou le fixer.Je recommande ce micro à tous ceux qui cherchent un matériel de qualité professionnelle pour leurs projets audiovisuels ou tout simplement pour communiquer. Il offre un rapport qualité-prix imbattable et une facilité d'utilisation appréciable. C'est un investissement rentable qui vous permettra de réaliser des enregistrements de haute qualité.
